settings.title: Iisetingi
settings.logoutDescription: Uya kuxhuzulwa kwiphepha lokuqala kwaye kuya kufuneka ungene kwakhona ukuze ufikelele kwi-akhawunti yakho.

hero.title: I-Inshurensi Ekrelekrele Yamafama AseMzantsi Afrika
hero.subtitle: Khusela izityalo nezilwanyana zakho ngesigqubuthelo esikhokhelwa yi-AI. Fumana iintlawulo ngokukhawuleza xa imozulu ibetha.

smartProtection.title: Ukukhuselwa Kwezityalo Okukrelekrele
smartProtection.description: I-AI ijonga iipateni zemozulu kwaye ngokuzenzekelayo iqalisa iintlawulo xa imigangatho ifezekile.

mobileClaims.title: Amabango Efowuni Kuqala
mobileClaims.description: Faka amabango ngokukhawuleza nge-app yethu okanye i-USSD. Akukho maphepha, akukho kulinda.

instantPayouts.title: Iintlawulo Ngokukhawuleza
instantPayouts.description: Fumana imbuyekezo kwiiyure ezingama-48 ngokuthe ngqo kwisipaji sakho semali yefowuni.

community.title: Uluntu Lwamafama
community.description: Nxibelelana namanye amafama, yabelana ngolwazi, kwaye ufikelele kwizixhobo zezolimo.

trust.title: Ithenjwa Ngamafama Angaphezu kwe-10,000+
trust.subtitle: Joyina amawaka amafama aseMzantsi Afrika akhusela ubomi bawo nge-InsurAgri.

cta.title: Qala Namhlanje
cta.subtitle: Khusela ifama yakho nge-inshurensi ekrelekrele eyenzelwe ezolimo zaseMzantsi Afrika.

learn.title: Iziko Lokufunda
learn.subtitle: Fikelela kwizikhokelo zokufama, iindlela ezintle kakhulu, nolwazi lwezolimo ukuphucula impumelelo yakho yokufama.

featuredContent.title: Izicwangciso Zokulungiselela Imbalela
featuredContent.description: Ubuchule obubalulekileyo bokucwangcisa ifama yakho ngamaxesha omileyo

emailVerification.title: Ukuqinisekiswa Kwe-imeyile Kuyafuneka
emailVerification.message: Nceda uqinisekise idilesi ye-imeyile yakho ngaphambi kokugqiba ukubhalisa kwakho.
emailVerification.error: Ayikwazanga ukuthumela i-imeyile yokuqinisekisa. Nceda uzame kwakhona.

register.success: Ukubhalisa kuphumelele! Nceda ujjonge i-imeyile yakho ukuze uqinisekise i-akhawunti yakho.
register.emailExists: I-akhawunti enale imeyile sele ikho. Nceda usebenzise imeyile eyahlukileyo okanye uzame ukungena.
